metadata.synopsis: Dog's collar, from Rascal, Emperor's Dog in his former live.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Inside the private room at Elfsong Tavern, players need to take the Rascal Collar over the tableS_LOW_Elfsong_EmperorRascal_91e7d1ee-1455-47a8-b248-5e5c85940d43

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: Rascal's collar... My poor four-legged friend. Their lives are so brief, so simple, and yet - full.
